data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: Paessler - Cloud based platform offering network performance monitoring solutions. Raised funding over 1 round from 1 investor. Founded by Dirk Paessler in the year 1997. Paessler has 805 competitors.

Paessler - About the company

What does Paessler do?

Cloud based platform offering network performance monitoring solutions. It provides monitoring solutions for network monitoring and testing solutions. It offers features that include server performance monitoring, server room equipment monitoring, alerts, capacity planning, application server monitoring configuration, and more.

Which sectors and market segments does Paessler operate in?

Paessler serves in the B2B, SaaS space .

Paessler's funding and investors

How much funding has Paessler raised till date?

Paessler has raised funding over 1 round.

What are the most recent funding rounds of Paessler?

Its latest funding round was a PE round on May 23, 2024 for an undisclosed amount. 1 investor participated in its latest round, lead by Turn/River Capital.

Paessler's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Paessler

Paessler ranks 41 st among 805 competitors which include Datadog, SolarWinds and Quest Software. 84 of its competitors are funded while 110 have exited. Overall, Paessler and its competitors have raised over $4.06B in funding across 400 funding rounds involving 708 investors. There are 14 public and 96 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
